'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Usage 

* It is the only item used in a recipe to create a [Blackwood Hull](/blackwoodHull/), which is required to pass through Ondra's Mortar.

{{pe2crafttablecons|
{{Pe2craftcons|
|item =Blackwood Hull
|cost =64000
|ing1 =b1df9e4a-0139-4684-81c9-194f8fe4535c
|q1   =5
|ing2 =
|q2   =
|ing3 =
|q3   =
|ing4 =
|q4   =
}}
}}

##  Trivia 

* Blackwood Log was added in patch 5.0.0<ref>[https://forums.obsidian.net/topic/109231-patch-notes-for-500/?ct=1561642872 Patch Notes for 5.0.0]</ref>.
* Prior to this patch, Blackwood Hull could simply be purchased for {{cp2|64000}} from the ship supply vendor in [Neketaka](/neketaka/).
{{references}}

| location       = * [[Fort Deadlight]], [[Deadlight Donjon]]: Found in a cabinet in the bedroom area.
* [[Crookspur Dungeons]]: In a chest near the Slave Cell in the Crookspur Dungeons.
* [[Flooded cave]]: On an island to the far northeast of the world map, in the [[Ofecchia Channel]], and at the coordinates 5° 36, 66° 3'. The log is in a cabinet towards the back of study area.
* [[Splintered Reef]], [[Crypt Interior]]: In crates in the southwest room.
* [[Drowned Barrows - Crown]]: In the hidden study area of the crown, accessed via the hidden staircase in the northeast corner of the base floor.
| guid           = b1df9e4a-0139-4684-81c9-194f8fe4535c
